vlive.korean: 저기서 왜곡됐나 보다 큰일 났다 - 아니야? I guess he misunderstood it. Oh, no. - No? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.97
vlive.english: I guess he misunderstood it. Oh, no. - No?

vlive.korean: 이 언니 왜 이렇게 왜곡하지? Why is she distorting so much? 듣기 View video ITZY : 잠오는 브이앱🦋
vlive.english: Why is she distorting so much?

vlive.korean: 너 왜 왜곡해? Why are you distorting the truth? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : ☂️☂️의 토크타임
vlive.english: Why are you distorting the truth?

vlive.korean: 아니에요 - 왜 왜곡하죠? No. - Why are you distorting the fact? 듣기 View video JTBC PLUS : 성형에 성공한 스타명단(ft. 다이어트) & 성형으로 잃은 개성파배우

vlive.korean: 아니, 왜 곡을 새로 창조를 하고 있어요? Why are you creating a new song? 듣기 View video BTS : BTS 꿀FM 06.13 : Comeback Special
vlive.english: Why are you creating a new song?

examples.korean: Newspapers are often guilty of distorting the truth. 발음듣기 신문은 진실을 왜곡하는 잘못을 흔히 범한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Newspapers are often guilty of distorting the truth. 발음

examples.korean: Some scientific discoveries have been perverted to create weapons of destruction. 발음듣기 일부 과학적 발견들이 왜곡되어 파괴적인 무기를 만들어 내는 데 쓰여 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some scientific discoveries have been perverted to create weapons of destruction. 발음

examples.korean: It was a contorted version of the truth. 발음듣기 그것은 진실을 왜곡한 해석이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was a contorted version of the truth. 발음

examples.korean: You always twist everything I say. 발음듣기 당신은 항상 내가 하는 모든 말을 왜곡하는군요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You always twist everything I say. 발음

examples.korean: Her account was a perversion of the truth. 발음듣기 그녀의 설명은 진실을 왜곡한 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her account was a perversion of the truth. 발음
